name: Swervy Road
description:
Zoom through a colorful world by racing your car in an action packed city.

Swervy Road is the ultimate fast action car arcade style game that will test your reflexes and quick-thinking abilities!

Rev and zoom your car engine, ladies and gentlemen! Keep your index finger tightly pressed on the screen to zoom your way down a paved road filled with different colored cars! Keep your eyes peeled as your car changes color and always make sure to zoom past a car that does not match your color or you will go boom!

A fun, easy to learn, and incredibly addictive car game! How fast will your car go? Do you have what it takes to steer your car all the way to the end? Don't waste any more time and get the game right now for free! Zoom don’t boom!!
